SELECT rp.company_id companyId ,api.url apiUrl,users.id userId FROM sys_company_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_company_permission permission on permission.id=rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_permission_api_relation relation ON relation.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_api api ON api.id=relation.api_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_role role ON role.id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_user_role_relation rrelation ON role.id=rrelation.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_company_users users ON users.id=rrelation.user_id WHERE rp.flag_deleted=0 AND permission.flag_deleted=0 and role.flag_deleted=0 AND rrelation.flag_deleted=0 AND users.flag_deleted=0 AND api.flag_deleted=0 GROUP BY rp.company_id,api.url,users.id
